name: Koala
text: On Play: If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type, look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Nico Robin] or {Revolutionary Army} type card other than [Koala] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type, look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Nico Robin] or {Revolutionary Army} type card other than [Koala] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.
